name: n8n-agent-e2e-tests
description: E2E testing suite for n8n webhook agent with semantic validation

scripts.test:e2e: docker-compose run promptfoo-shell promptfoo eval -c configs/promptfoo.config.js --no-cache -o test-results/output.html
scripts.test:watch: docker-compose run promptfoo-shell promptfoo eval -c configs/promptfoo.config.js --watch
scripts.test:export: docker-compose run promptfoo-shell promptfoo export -o test-results/report.html
scripts.test:filter: docker-compose run promptfoo-shell promptfoo eval -c configs/promptfoo.config.js --filter
scripts.test:sharepoint: docker-compose run promptfoo-shell promptfoo eval -c configs/promptfoo.config.js --no-cache --filter-pattern SharePoint -o test-results/output.html
scripts.test:dry-run: docker-compose run promptfoo-shell promptfoo eval -c configs/promptfoo.config.js --dry-run
scripts.test:verbose: docker-compose run promptfoo-shell promptfoo eval -c configs/promptfoo.config.js -v
scripts.test:repeat: docker-compose run promptfoo-shell promptfoo eval -c configs/promptfoo.config.js --repeat
